articles.title: Liverpool confirm Firmino, Keita, Milner, Oxlade-Chamberlain exits - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Liverpool confirmed that the quartet of Roberto Firmino, Naby Keita, James Milner and Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain will leave the club this summer.
articles.content:
Liverpool have confirmed that the quartet of Roberto Firmino, Naby Keita, James Milner and Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain will leave the club when their contracts expire this summer.
